price: (Tukamwambia:) Tengeneza nguo za chuma pana, na kadiria sawa katika kuunganisha. Na tendeni mema. Hakika Mimi nayaona vyema mnayo yatenda.
arabic: أَنِ ٱعۡمَلۡ سَٰبِغَٰتٖ وَقَدِّرۡ فِي ٱلسَّرۡدِۖ وَٱعۡمَلُواْ صَٰلِحًاۖ إِنِّي بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ بَصِيرٞ
footnotes: Tulimfunulia kumwambia aunde nguo za chuma pana za kujilinda katika vita na maadui. Naye azifume kwa hikima na ustadi katika kuviunga viungo vyake. Na tukamwambia yeye na watu wake: Tendeni yatakayo kuleteeni kheri na maslaha. Hakika Mimi nayaona vyema yote myatendayo, hapana kinacho niporonyoka nisikione.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: ani iʿ'mal sābighātin waqaddir fī al-sardi wa-iʿ'malū ṣāliḥan innī bimā taʿmalūna baṣīrun
